data.product_title: Smart Interactive Dog Toys - Automatic Moving Bouncing & Rotating Dog Ball with E-TPU Material, New Electric Dog Toy USB-C Rechargeable, Active Rolling Balls for Medium-Large Dogs(Orange)
data.product_availability: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
about_product: [Upgraded Smart Dog Ball] A new generation of interactive dog ball toys has arrived! Made from ultra-lightweight E-TPU, the ball is durable and tooth-friendly, allowing your dog to indulge in endless chasing fun. Designed for intense play, it easily handles everyday adventures—just rinse and you're ready for a new round of fun!

[Smart Dual Modes, Switch Play Styles at Your Favour] Features two interactive modes: normal and smart, to suit your dog's play style. In normal mode, the ball automatically rolls and rotates for 5 minutes before entering standby mode. In smart mode, it automatically pauses after each interaction and activates with a simple touch, providing a more natural and responsive touch interaction experience that encourages your dog's continued exploration.

[Sturdy and Eco-Friendly Materials, Safe and Long-Lasting] Made from non-toxic, eco-friendly materials, it's bite-resistant and durable, easily resistant to strong chewing. The interchangeable shell extends the toy's lifespan, ensuring worry-free play every time. Whether it's a teething pup or an adult dog using it to release energy, this toy will accompany your dog's healthy growth and provide long-lasting fun.

[Designed for Medium and Large Dogs] Approximately 3.2 inches in diameter, it's suitable for dogs weighing over 35 pounds. The unique textured surface gently cleans teeth during playtime, promoting oral health. We recommend initial instruction to help your dog master the correct chasing technique, making this both an interactive and engaging experience and a great training opportunity!

[USB-C Fast Charging, Long-Lasting Battery Life] A 50-minute charge provides 3.5 hours of continuous playtime. The waterproof design allows for easy cleaning and maintenance. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor play, it's the perfect companion for your dog's playtime needs, anytime, anywhere. It's the perfect companion for releasing energy and promoting exercise!
data.delivery: FREE delivery Saturday, November 1 Or Prime members get FREE delivery Wednesday, October 29. Order within 8 hrs 37 mins. Join Prime
